description: Lists information about the IAM OpenID Connect (OIDC) provider resource objects defined in the AWS account.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: By understanding which OIDC providers are configured, attackers might infer the password policies tied to these providers.
Identifying OIDC providers gives attackers insights into the cloud infrastructure, revealing the different third-party services and platforms integrated with the AWS environment.
Listing OIDC providers provides details about the system's authentication setup, contributing to the overall system information an attacker can gather.

incidents.description: Muddled Libra’s Evolution to the Cloud

securityImplications: Attackers might use ListOpenIDConnectProviders to discover if there are OIDC providers configured.
